pages.text: qasam hai asmaan ki aur andhere mein roushan hone waale ki
tujhe maloom bhi hai ke wo raath ko namodaar hone waali cheez kya hai
wo roushan sitaara hai
koyi aisa nahi, jis par nigehbaan farishta na ho
insaan ko dekhna chahiye ke wo kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
wo ek uchalte paani se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peet aur sine ke darmiyaan se nikalta hai
beshak wo ise pher laane par yaqinan khudrath rakhne waala hai
jis din poshida bhedho ki jaanch padtaal hogi
to na hoga us ke paas kuch zoor na madadgaar
baarish waale asmaan ki qasam
aur phatne waale zameen ki qasam
beshak ye (Qurâ€™aan) albatta do tok faisla karne waala kalaam hai
ye hasi ki (aur be fayeda) baath nahi
albatta kaafir daao ghaath mein hai
aur main bhi ek chaal chal raha hoon
tu kaafiro ko muhallath de, inhe thode dino chohd de
apne bahuth hee bulandh Allah ke naam ki paakizgi bayaan kar
jis ne paida kiya aur sahih saalim banaya
aur jis ne (theek thaak) andaaza kiya aur phir raah dikhaayi
aur jis ne taaza ghaans paida ki
phir us ne is ko (sukha kar) siyaah koda kar diya
hum tujhe padayenge, phir tu na bhulega
magar jo kuch Allah chaahe, wo zaaher aur poshida ko jaanta hai
hum aap ke liye asaani paida kar denge
to aap nasihath karte rahe, agar nasihath kuch fayda de
darne waala to nasihath le ga
(haan) badh baqth us se gurez karega
jo badi aag mein jayega
jahaan phir na wo marega na jiyega (balke haalate niza mein pada rahega)
beshak us ne falaah paayi jo paak ho gaya
aur jis ne apne rab ka naam yaad rakha aur namaaz padta raha
